description: Camera doorbells manufactured by the Chinese company Eken Group Ltd under the brands EKEN and Tuck are affected by major vulnerabilities. Researchers from Consumer Reports (CR) discovered severe vulnerabilities in doorbell cameras manufactured by the Chinese company Eken Group Ltd. The company produces video doorbells under the brand names EKEN and Tuck, its products are […]
title: Eken camera doorbells allow ill-intentioned individuals to spy on you

title: Security Affairs newsletter Round 461 by Pierluigi Paganini – INTERNATIONAL EDITION

description: A U.S. Court ordered surveillance firm NSO Group to hand over the source code for its Pegasus spyware and other products to Meta. Meta won the litigation against the Israeli spyware vendor NSO Group, a U.S. Judge ordered the surveillance firm to hand over the source code for its Pegasus spyware and other products to the social network giant. […]
title: U.S. Judge ordered NSO Group to hand over the Pegasus spyware code to WhatsApp
